mean_en: the people who have the most wealth and status in a society :the most successful or powerful group of people
word_etyma: e出+lite选择，收集 →选出的人物 →精英人物
short_phrase: The elite hotel only takes VIPs.
sentence: Members of the social elite spend their time smoking Cuban cigars and playing golf.
sentence_trans: 社会精英会抽雪茄、打高尔夫。
